TutorialÂ¶

Heteromotility consists of modular components:

  1. Motility feature quantification with the heteromotility CLI
  2. Subpath feature extraction with the heteromotility CLI
  3. Unsupervised clustering analysis tools
  4. Supervised classification tools
  5. Detailed balance analysis by N-dimensional probability flux analysis

The following tutorials explore each of these components using simulated data sets. A guided analysis of simulated data is also provided.

  • Motility Feature Quantification
    • Input Data Format
    • Feature Extraction
    • Output Data Format
  • Subpath Analysis
    • Subpath Feature Extraction
    • Output Data Format
  • Unsupervised Clustering
